name: Dev-madness
description:
The DEV made a lot of errors and bugs in his project , by mistake he opened the portal between bugs world and his world , your goal is to survive and get out of this place

Controls:

- arrows to move

- s to switch characters

- x to use or fire

- r to restart

when timer appears keep pressing x to continue hacking the door , and look out for bugs if they hit you it's game over.
